metadata.title: RZ/G2L: Standards compliance of evaluation boards

sections.content:
Question:
What is the state of standards compliance for module boards of RZ/G2L evaluation boards?
Answer:
The module boards of RZ/G2L EVK comply with the SMARC2.1 standard. Refer to the following for details. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rzg2l-evaluation-board-kit-rzg2l-evaluation-board-kit
Partner boards, etc. that comply with other standards are also available. For details on partner boards, see the following page. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rz-partner-solutions#quick-link-2846
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L
